text:
Rocketbox | Mumbai, India | ONSITE

We provide B2B Transport services along with Transport Management Software. We use Ruby, Postgresql, Mongodb, Chef, AWS.

Software Engineer - will be part of 3 member team working in a new Elixir based project https://rocketbox.in/careers

Interview: A phone screen (about previous work), programming project (take home) followed by onsite work with team.

Include this hacker news link while applying.
